response.headline: Asian sauce recipe ingredients list with gochujang, maple syrup, rice vinegar, sesame oil and garlic
response.summary: Recipe calls for 6 tablespoons gochujang (adjust to taste as brands vary in spiciness), 4 tablespoons maple syrup, 1 tablespoon rice vinegar, 1 tablespoon plus 1 teaspoon sesame oil, and 3 cloves minced garlic.

extracted_text: 6 tablespoons gochujang, adjust to taste. Some brands are spicier than others.
Cook Mode Prevent your screen from going dark
image_details.key_interest: Complete ingredient list with specific measurements for an Asian sauce recipe
